item.title: Create a Site-to-Site VPN to Microsoft Azure
item.description: I have a Visual Studio Enterprise subscription in Azure. I use this subscription for testing new Azure stuff. From my on-premises environment, I want to create a Site-To-Site (S2S) VPN connection to Microsoft Azure. I have a physical Ubiquiti Edge Router in my on-premises network. When searching the internet I found a lot of information that was outdated or not completed. After figuring out how to configure all the steps I decided to create a blog post about the configuration steps.
